column4: can some one help me with vncserver pleas, i cant find why do i get black screen when connect to vncserver with out using sudo
can some one help me with vncserver pleas, i cant find why do i get black screen when connect to vncserver with out using sudo
can you pastebin your exact connection command?
thats the server command, whats your client command?
i am here, you gave me the server command, whats your client command?
run thightvnc or ultravnc from vista
and i both i get same screen
uh, dont know nothing about vista, sorry :-(
i think probelem is with server because if i run sudo vncserver everything works fine only i cant kill server with comman vncserver -kill :1
http://www.linuxquestions.org/questions/linux-software-2/vnc-server-and-red-hat-8-blank-screen-103360/ that is exactly like my problem i just have blank startup
hmm, i think you can kill any program by using: kill -9 $pid
ps axu | grep vncserver to find the process id. then "kill -9 $processid" (replace $processid with _your_ value)
ah, i remember you, could you just repost your vnc server command?
